item.description:
I have been eager to play my National Parks monopoly game with a group of like-minded folks!  We will build tents and cabins instead of hotels :)  I will send out directions by email on Friday.

If you change your mind, please update your rsvp as soon as possible since we can only have a small group limited to game size and someone from the waiting list can join; thanks!

Please bring your own beverage if you would like alcohol (and take it back with you:)).  I will have appetizers to snack on.  Also bring $1 for Nina to help pay for meetup website fees.

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Play National Park Monopoly!
